reviewText:
Lots of good information on this disc >But it can not be viewed on a standard Dvd  player with out hanging up, you have to watch it on a computer
the disk is not formatted and or finished properly,if it was I would give it 5 stars.

Two reviews in one; artisan ideas has excellent customer service. They stand behind their product. And Mr Sorrells is a very skilled craftsman who is good at teaching. You should buy this before you even consider sharpening your sword, or you just might ruin it. It's more than a big knife and as such it can't be treated like one. Unless you already understand this sort of thing this is pretty much a must.
